name: listEvents
description: This method returns an Array of type EventDescription with all events previously created with addEvent().
signatures: Array<EventDescription> listEvents(Integer peerId, Integer channel, String variable)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: 0 for triggered events or 1 for timed events. When specified listEvents returns only events of this event type.

parameters.name: peedId
parameters.description: The id of the peer to get events for.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel of the peer to get events for or -1 to return the events for all channels.

parameters.name: variable
parameters.description: The name of a peer's parameter inside channel. When specified listEvents returns only events for this parameter.

returnValue: Returns an Array of type EventDescription on success
